entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
